What_is_the_club: GDSC stands for Google Developer Students club and hosts a series of hackathons, tech workshops webinars by experts

This club is an independent club @ BITS Pilani - Dubai Campus
and aims to reach the students for a better learning experience in the field of App Development and WebDesign.

This club is an independent club @ BITS Pilani - Dubai Campus and it deals in computer related events.
It can be everything from ethical hacking to photoshop, animation to web designing.

This club is an independent club @ BITS Pilani - Dubai Campus and it deals in computer related events.
It is a branch of ACM and it empowers women in computing by providing services and opportunities for personal and professional growth.

IEEE is an independent club @ BITS Pilani - Dubai Campus which is dedicated to promoting engineers and scientists, 
inspiring students to follow their academic interests in a career in engineering and science.

IEEE Women In Engineering (WIE) is an independent club @ BITS Pilani - Dubai Campus which is dedicated to promoting 
women engineers and scientists, inspiring girls to follow their academic interests in a career in engineering and science.
